job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field

jd: From: Manasa S, iTech US INC manasa.s@itechus.net Reply to: manasa.s@itechus.net Hi..............Greetings, This is Manasa from ITech US Inc. Given below are the details of the position with one of our clients and was wondering if you would be interested or can recommend someone who would be interested in this job. Job Role: Java Full stack DeveloperJob Location: North Quincy, MA & Boston, MA (Need local ID proof)Duration: 12+ months contractCompetencies: Kafka, Microservices, Spring Boot, Hibernate ORM, Core JavaMax rate: $55/hr on C2C Onsite From Day 1Visa: H1B | Need passport number along with the submission Role Description: Provide innovative and creative solutions to problems.Participate in all aspects of software development, including design, implementation, deployment & beyond.provide guidance to peers on building systems optimized for speed and scale.Ensure high application availability, performance, scalability.maintain high standards for code quality, with special emphasize on secure codingCollaborate across time zones via collaboration tools.Experience with full stack development. ( React is a must )Good knowledge on Java, Microservices & Spring boot.Experience on back end ( PROCs, SQLs, functions etc )Understanding of good RDBMS practices.Financial Services experience is a plusAbility to multi-task and to take the initiative when needed Key ResponsibilitiesStrong Knowledge in following areas.Full stack development.Java ( EE ) & Java scriptMicroservices & Spring bootJPA / Hibernate.Kakfa & Jms.React Js & other UI libs.Oracle / DB2 with ability to write complex queries & Store proc.Junit, Mocking Libs.Tools: git , maven, ant , npm , postman , shell script.Excellent debugging and optimization skills.Good understanding of design patterns. Education: At least a bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field is required for the project Thanks & Regards Manasa SallaSr Technical RecruiteriTech US, Incmanasa.s@itechus.netSkype : https://join.skype.com/invite/ySKCsGOLdrDELinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/manasa-salla-0836711a8
